name: Jordan Pond
description:
Controls:
To start fishing, Right Click to cast your rod. Wait for the hook sound. 
The hook will set automatically. Hold Left Click to reel up. Let go of left click to reel down.
Keep the fish inside the green bar until the progress bar is full.

A short project to learn the Godot engine. The game features a Stardew Valley style fishing loop. There are four fish to catch and a trophy room to display the largest fish of each species.
